attributes.comment:
I strongly oppose any fees increases.It has been almost 3 years since I applied
for I-485 and I haven't seen any progress. Every year I have been renewing my
EAD/Advance Parole application/canadian and mexican visas for business
purposes and they are already costing me a fortune.

Also, the current USCIS service sucks with their random processing. I had to
contact my state senator's office twice to get my wife's EAD and Advance Parole
appication approved on time. I don't believe Mr. Emilio Gonzalez's testimony in the
congress that the fees increases will make things better and it is a blatant lie as
known in immigrant community.

I am a legal immigrant with a Master's degree from the US. I have been paying
taxes regulary for the past 8 years and USCIS is taking immigrants like me for a
ride for its poor service.

Any fees increases imposes an additional financial burden on us and once again I
strongly oppose any increases. In reality, I believe they should decrease the fees
for their incompetent service.

- A concerned Immigrant

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
